1.0.12.title: Embeds, Tickets, Moderation, Server Logs & User Preferences
features: Custom embed sender - create beautiful embedded messages with /embed command
Complete ticket/report system with /ticket for bug reports, feedback, and support requests
Moderation commands - /mod with kick, ban, unban, timeout, warn, warnings, clearwarnings
Automatic server logging system with 4 categories: message, voice, server, and bot logs
Log channels auto-created with /logs setup - private channels for admins only
Grant log access to specific roles with /logs access
Per-user default music source preference with /setup source me
Personal source overrides server default - priority: command > user > server
Message logs track edits and deletions with content and author info
Voice logs track joins, leaves, moves, mutes, deafens, streaming, and camera
Server logs track member joins/leaves, role changes, nicknames, bans, and timeouts
Bot logs track all command usage with parameters, user, channel, and errors
Warning system with persistent storage - track member warnings over time
fixes: Fixed Docker healthcheck using wrong environment variable name
Fixed embed command failing due to customId length limit
Fixed version announcements not triggering after updates
changes: New /embed command with modal for full embed customization
New /ticket command with setup, create, close, delete, list, user subcommands
New /mod command with 7 moderation subcommands
New /logs command with setup, enable, disable, access, status, delete subcommands
/setup source now has 'server' and 'me' subcommands instead of 'default'
Help command includes new Moderation and Tickets categories
Play command now checks user preference before server default

1.0.11.title: Live Karaoke Lyrics, Smarter Autoplay & DJ Mode Fixes
features: Real-time lyrics that follow along with the music - like karaoke!
See exactly which line is playing with a â–¶ highlight
Lyrics automatically scroll and update as the song plays
Click the lyrics button on the player for instant synced lyrics
Choose between live updating lyrics or full song lyrics with /lyrics command
Works best with Deezer tracks - falls back to other sources if needed
Shows progress through the song (e.g., line 15 of 87)
Timestamps displayed for each line so you know what's coming
Automatically stops when you skip or the song ends
Redesigned autoplay system - prioritizes Deezer and Spotify over YouTube
Smart source fallback - only uses YouTube when premium sources fail
Spotify recommendations now integrated into autoplay for better variety
fixes: Fixed DJ mode skip voting - votes now count properly
Fixed DJ mode hybrid skip returning twice causing errors
Fixed DJ mode proposal approval failing when voice channel is unavailable
Fixed DJ mode store race condition during initialization
Fixed autoplay falling back to YouTube too early
Fixed Spotify recommendations API 404 error (deprecated endpoint replaced)
Fixed lyrics sync being too slow and not matching actual audio
Fixed lyrics line counter showing literal text instead of numbers
changes: Lyrics now come from multiple sources for better availability
Player lyrics button shows live synced lyrics by default
/lyrics command has new 'synced' option - use /lyrics synced:true for live lyrics
Improved lyrics accuracy - no more wrong song lyrics!
Autoplay now checks Deezer first, then Spotify, then YouTube as last resort
Better autoplay scoring - Deezer tracks get +40 points, Spotify +35, YouTube Mix +15
DJ mode now falls back to DJ's voice channel if original requester's channel is gone
Lyrics sync now uses position interpolation for accurate timing
Lyrics update 4x faster (250ms vs 1000ms) with 300ms lookahead for better sync
Spotify recommendations now use artist top tracks + related artists instead of deprecated API

1.0.10.title: Deezer FLAC, Search History, Session Export, Music Wrapped & Health Monitoring
features: Music source selection - choose between Auto, Deezer, YouTube, or Spotify in /play command
Server-wide default source preference via /setup source default
Position-independent autocomplete - select source before or after typing query
Auto mode combines Deezer and YouTube results for maximum variety
Deezer FLAC lossless audio quality as default playback source
Autocomplete now returns Deezer tracks with smart fallback to YouTube
Quality display in player embed - shows audio quality for each source
Search history tracking - automatically saves all /play searches (up to 100 per user)
Search history commands - view, replay, search, export to playlist, and clear
Session queue export - save entire listening session (history + queue) as playlist
Smart like/unlike detection - like button checks if track is already liked
Unlike confirmation prompt when trying to like an already-liked track
Personal music wrapped - view your listening stats with /wrapped me
Top tracks, top artists, listening patterns, and streak tracking
Server-wide wrapped statistics with /wrapped server
Activity levels and achievements based on listening history
Comprehensive health monitoring system with real-time metrics
Admin health commands - status, metrics, errors, and reset
System performance tracking: memory, CPU, event loop lag
Lavalink connection monitoring and latency tracking
Command success rate tracking and error aggregation
Enhanced logging with automatic log rotation (10MB, 5 files)
Structured JSON logs option for machine parsing
Performance metrics logging with metric() function
Detailed stats command with top sources and activity hours
fixes: Fixed Lavalink startup issues with plugin compatibility
Fixed autocomplete returning incorrect results
Fixed playback errors for valid Deezer searches
Improved error tracking and reporting
Better health status detection for system issues
Fixed critical issue causing console spam and bot freezing
Fixed loop button not working properly - now cycles correctly through all modes
Fixed queue export creating duplicate tracks when exporting sessions
Fixed Lavalink latency showing as N/A in health monitoring
Fixed user stats not being tracked properly when playing music
Fixed missing formatDuration import causing track logging errors
Fixed malformed patchNotes.json causing announcer initialization failure
changes: Autocomplete now respects selected source dynamically (Auto/Deezer/YouTube/Spotify)
Guild state now stores defaultSource preference (defaults to Deezer)
Playback functions accept source parameter for flexible searching
Playback now prioritizes Deezer for higher quality audio
Queue command now has subcommands: view and export
History stored per-user with server filtering option
Improved search and playback reliability
Updated plugin configuration for better compatibility
User stats now track per-user: tracks, artists, sources, listening time
Stats store expanded with daily/monthly activity tracking
Health monitoring auto-starts on bot initialization
Logs automatically rotate when reaching size limit
New environment variables: LOG_LEVEL, JSON_LOGS
Error logs now automatically record in health monitoring
Track play/fail/skip events recorded for health metrics
Queue export now intelligently removes duplicate songs from different sources
Loop mode button now properly displays current state and cycles through all options
Health metrics now show accurate Lavalink connection latency
Enhanced logging system with emoji indicators for all operations
All track lifecycle events now show readable metadata instead of encoded data
Command logs now include user, guild, and ID for better debugging
Playback operations (pause, resume, skip, stop) now log track and state changes
Consistent log format across all modules with visual emoji indicators
Deezer search results now show track titles instead of technical metadata
Fallback system logs now include track transitions and sources

1.0.9.title: Complete Playlist System
features: Full playlist management system - create, edit, share, and play custom playlists
User playlists (personal) and server playlists (shared with everyone)
Liked Songs playlist with quick-add via /like command and player button
Share playlists with 8-character codes or directly with specific users
Collaborative playlists - allow others to add/remove tracks
Import playlists from Spotify and YouTube URLs
Playlist pagination for easy browsing
Track search with autocomplete when adding to playlists
13 playlist commands for complete management
fixes: Playlist view now updates in place instead of sending multiple messages
Like button repositioned for better accessibility
changes: Share codes expire after 24 hours
DJ mode integration - DJs control server playlists when DJ mode is active
Protected Liked Songs playlist cannot be deleted or renamed

1.0.8.title: Live Autocomplete for Play Command
features: Live autocomplete search - get instant song suggestions as you type
Smart deduplication for cleaner results
Fast and responsive search experience

1.0.7.title: Deezer Integration for Enhanced Autoplay
features: Deezer recommendations for better autoplay quality
Improved genre consistency and track discovery
Faster and more reliable recommendations
changes: Spotify credentials now optional

1.0.6.title: SeekTo & Previous Button Fixes
fixes: Fixed seekTo command rejecting flexible timestamp formats
Fixed previous button not updating track info correctly
Fixed player synchronization issues
changes: SeekTo now accepts multiple formats: seconds, MM:SS, or H:MM:SS

1.0.5.title: Version Announcements & Patch Notes System
features: Automatic version announcements for new updates
/changelog command to view patch notes with navigation
/setup announcements to configure announcement preferences
Bot status now shows current version
Interactive navigation between versions

1.0.4.title: Stability & Smart Autoplay Update
features: 24/7 radio mode - continuous playback like a radio station
Smart artist diversity with vibe matching
Automatic reconnection when Discord changes voice servers
Enhanced autoplay with genre, tempo, and energy awareness
fixes: Fixed EQ panel not updating correctly
Improved duplicate prevention
Fixed tracks playing twice
Fixed bot disconnecting on voice region changes
Fixed various command errors
changes: Better autoplay algorithm with smarter scoring
Faster EQ panel updates

1.0.3.title: Enhanced Autoplay & EQ Improvements
features: Tempo consistency in autoplay for natural flow
Time-of-day awareness - adjusts music energy
Mood and energy progression tracking
Interactive 15-band EQ mixer with A/B comparison
Custom EQ presets (up to 10 per user)
Real-time visual feedback in EQ panel
fixes: Fixed EQ panel errors and positioning issues
Fixed autoplay looping same tracks
changes: Better autoplay with audio feature analysis
EQ panel auto-cleanup after inactivity
Skip learning avoids unwanted genres

1.0.2.title: DJ Mode & Statistics Update
features: DJ mode with role-based permissions and approvals
Skip voting system with multiple modes
Statistics tracking via /stats command
Tracks listening hours, users, and activity patterns
fixes: Fixed session calculations
Fixed requester info display
Fixed duplicate messages on Raspberry Pi

1.0.1.title: Autoplay & Lyrics Update
features: Smart autoplay with genre awareness
Lyrics lookup with /lyrics command
Interactive queue management
Track removal by position or keyword
fixes: Fixed lyrics fetching wrong songs
Fixed queue display issues
Fixed seekTo command problems
Fixed age-restricted content handling
changes: Better recommendations from multiple sources
Automatic filtering of non-music content

1.0.0.title: Initial Release
features: Complete music playback system
Slash command interface
YouTube and Spotify support
Queue management with shuffle and loop
Volume control and seek

Persistent state across restarts
